original_text: Speak unto the children of Israel, and say unto them, If any man's wife go aside, and commit a trespass against him,
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손에게 말하여 그들에게 이르라 만일 어떤 사람의 아내가 탈선하여 남편에게 신의를 저버렸고

sentences.original_text: Speak unto the children of Israel
If any man's wife go aside
and commit a trespass against him
